title: Metroticket Calculator for Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC) Survival
desc: The Metroticket Calculator Hepatocellular Carcinoma Survival determines 3 and 5 year predicted survival for patient with HCC undergoing liver transplantation.

orgreference.text: Mazzaferro V, et al. Predicting survival after liver transplantation in patients with hepatocellular carcinoma beyond the Milan criteria: a retrospective, exploratory analysis. Lancet Oncol. 2009 Jan;10(1):35-43. doi: 10.1016/S1470-2045(08)70284-5. Epub 2008 Dec 4.

data.evidence: Complex matrix of values based on number of nodules and diameter of nodules.
data.facts: For more information on the Metroticket calculators, visit the Metroticket Project website.
